title: Cannot open league on mac
body:
I've reinstalled like 5 times in the past 2 weeks (probably 20+ times ever), i've tried all the other suggestions i can find on the forums but nothing works. I click the client icon as normal it bounces up once then goes back down and remains there, i check whether the app is running (alt, cmd, esc) and it says 'not responding'.

Would really appreciate any help anyone can offer, getting sick of waiting all that time when i could be wrecking scrubs : /
(on eww, not sure if that helps)

replies.body: This can happen if your connection is having trouble connecting to the patching service on Macs, so nothing is going to come up.  I'm not sure what you've tried out so far, but you'll want to start with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.
